thread.section_title: Truecar Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Truecar | truecar.com | 2 of 35
thread.title: Giancarlo Bruno

author: Giancarlo Bruno
title: Giancarlo Bruno
text: We are very happy with True Car, they helped us get a great price on our 2017 Jeep Cherokee. Because True Car was able to get us such great pricing, we were able to upgrade to a Jeep with leather seats and options we thought we could otherwise not afford. Then the dealership made an honest mistake and charged us for the $995 destination charge twice, I did not pick up on the error initially until a few days after we took our Jeep home. We contacted True Car and they did contact the new car dealer on our behalf, we worked with the dealer and they refunded us the money they owed us to correct the error. Thank You True Car!!!
